clickHereToPostRequirement: click here if you are looking to post a requirement
sitBackForSuppliers: Sit back for multiple suppliers to contact you.
chooseSuppliers: Choose among the suppliers based on the ratings and reviews.
postRequirementsSupplier: Complete your profile and get Verified
sitBackForBuyers: Select service tags for relevant opportunities
chooseBuyers: Reach out to buyers and Expand your business
diveDescription: Signing up with HABOT opens the door to a world of new opportunities and potential for business growth. Gain access to a vibrant community of like-minded individuals, unlock valuable resources, and take the first step towards realizing your entrepreneurial dreams.
buyersPost: Buyers post their needs and review top suppliers, while suppliers
topSuppliers: complete profiles, connect with potential buyers, and build successful business relationships, sharing valuable feedback.
reviewSelectContact: Review, Select, and Contact the Best Suppliers
suppliersCompleteProfile: Suppliers Complete your profile and get notified for opportunities
contactBuyers: Contact to Buyers and Share your Quote for the service
connectMakeBusiness: Both the Parties can Connect and Make Business Leave a Feedback
